page.title: 14Lower Tulleyswells Farm
page.content: The caravans can only stay 28 days and then they have to move on. She owns 120 acres of land and grows only potatoes. Her only workers are herself and her two sons because her husband died at Christmas.They have three David Brown tractors,one farm van,a farm car,some manure spreaders and a hay baler.Their farm pets are two dogs,two cats and one sheep.She keeps chickens for Christmas and one bull.It is a dairy farm.They keep 90 cows and 60 calves for milk. Lower Tulleyswells Farm is on a small country lane off the A275 just outside the small village of Cooksbridge.There are no other homes close to the farm house,but just to the south there is another farm called Tullyswells Farm. There is no connection between the two farms even though they have the same name.
